title: MAG 104 - Sneak Preview
itunes:title: MAG 104 - Sneak Preview
itunes:subtitle: Case #0171406Statement of Timothy Stoker, on the disappearance of his brother, Danny, four years ago. Statement given June 14th 2017.
description:
Case #0171406


Statement of Timothy Stoker, on the disappearance of his brother, Danny, four years ago. Statement given June 14th 2017.




Content Warnings for this episode are at the end of the show notes.



Thanks to this week's Patrons: iamalivenow, Matthew Fisher, Emily T, Arca Vournelis, Robertson Whitney, Hekate Kennedy, Abe Kenmore, Kea C, Matthew Entecott, Hal Moncrief



If you'd like to support us, head to www.patreon.com/rustyquill



Edited this week by Elizabeth Moffatt, Brock Winstead & Alexander J Newall.



Performances:



  • "Martin Blackwood" - Alexander J Newall
  •  "Tim Stoker" - Mike Lebeau
  •  "Elias Bouchard" - Ben Meredith



Sound effects for this episode provided by kemitix & cosmic embers.



Check out our merchandise at https://www.redbubble.com/people/rustyquill/collections/708982-the-magnus-archives-s1



You can subscribe to this podcast using your podcast software of choice, or by visiting www.rustyquill.com/subscribe



Please rate and review on your software of choice, it really helps us to spread the podcast to new listeners, so share the fear.



Content Warning for:



  •  explicit language
  •  clowns
  •  body horror
